dcterms:creator: H. Kamper
F. D. Wet
T. Hain
T. Niesler
dcterms:description: A corpus of South African Broadcast News consisting of 23 hours of speech from news bulletins broadcast between 1996 and 2006 by SAFM, containing a mix of newsreader speech, interviews, and crossings to reporters.
dcterms:title: South African Broadcast News (SABN)

dcterms:description: A set of 1920 recorded isolated keywords, each spoken twice by 24 speakers, used as exemplars in a DTW-based template matching system.
dcterms:title: Isolated Keywords (1920 recorded keywords)
